channel.title: Daniel Cosme's Webpage on Daniel Cosme
channel.description: Recent content in Daniel Cosme's Webpage on Daniel Cosme

item.title: Child's Play
item.description: You can play it at Gamejolt (start from level 2) You are a child playing in his backyard, you have to protect your cheerios from ants. The game was a team project during my 4th session at College LaSalle in their video game programming specialization.

item.title: Curious Ape
item.description: Motivation The following body of text has no technical content whatsoever, feel free to jump to the technical overview. As far as I know we are all apes going through the World trying to understand it and ourselves. The better way to understand one-self is to keep track of the things that matter (to us), is all about tracking from a place of curiosity. I would like to keep track of certain core Habits that (by my own definition) would signal whether I am living a “good life”, independent of my occupation, where I live, or the people around me.
